import React from "react"; class Cart extends React.Component { render() { console.log(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('Products')||'[]')); var tab = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('Products')); return (
{tab.map(product=>( ))}
Product Price Quantity Subtotal

{product.title}

{product.description}

 {product.price} 1.99
Total 1.99
Continue Shopping Total $1.99 Checkout
); } } export default Cart;
